actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 with regard to renewal of broadcast licenses and service rendered by broadcast licensees.

summary.text: Sets qualification standards for competing applicants, under the Communications Act of 1934, for renewal of broadcast licenses. Provides for the regulation of service rendered by broadcast licensee.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 with regard to renewal of broadcast licenses and service rendered by broadcast licensees.
